channel.title: Comments on: Blox Lite
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Diego
item.dc:creator: Nick Diego
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/blox-lite/#comment-470">Fran Eleazer</a>.
Thanks for the shoutout Fran, I sincerely appreciate the kind words!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Fran Eleazer.

Thanks for the shoutout Fran, I sincerely appreciate the kind words!

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
Hey Fran, thanks for the add.
I've not been able to try Blox yet, so it's great to hear someone else's experience with it!
item.content:encoded:
Hey Fran, thanks for the add.

I’ve not been able to try Blox yet, so it’s great to hear someone else’s experience with it!

item.title: By: Fran Eleazer
item.dc:creator: Fran Eleazer
item.description: I have tried so many different plugins to add custom headers to the top of the page, and none of them did exactly what I wanted, but THIS. And it does so much more than that, I haven't even scratched the surface. Great support from Nick Diego. This is an update from a previous plugin, Genesis Custom Headers.
item.content:encoded: I have tried so many different plugins to add custom headers to the top of the page, and none of them did exactly what I wanted, but THIS. And it does so much more than that, I haven’t even scratched the surface. Great support from Nick Diego. This is an update from a previous plugin, Genesis Custom Headers.
